page.title: 14Barnt Green medical centres
page.content: In our study of the medical facilities within the villages of Barnt Green, Cofton Hackett and Hopwood we found that there were two {general practices; }an{osteopath; }a {dental surgery; a pharmacist}and a {physiotherapist. There is a{child clinic}in Cofton Village Hall once a month but apart from this there are no other medical facilities in Cofton Hackett. Our survey showed that 72% of the population used the general practice in Barnt Green but only 44% used the dental surgery in the village.
